alert.note: Alert for Bon Homme; Clay; Union; Yankton (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 25 at 2:11PM MST until December 26 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 AM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...In Iowa, Plymouth, Cherokee, Woodbury and Ida Counties. In Nebraska, Dixon and Dakota Counties. In South Dakota, Bon Homme, Yankton, Clay and Union Counties. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 3 AM CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas with snowfall from earlier today will have potential for drifting snow and spotty reduced visibility in blowing snow.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
